system.description: Choose one type of weapon. You are especially good at scoring critical hits with that weapon.
system.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, base attack bonus +8
system.benefit: When using the weapon you selected, your threat range is doubled.
system.special: You can gain Improved Critical multiple times. The effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon. A fighter may select Improved Critical as one of his fighter bonus feats.
